name: Super Monster Truck Car Race
description:
Super Monster Truck Car Race!!!
Drive multiple crazy monster truck vehicles while competing with opponents and death racing rivals. Control your monster truck with physics because heavy trucks to bounce, drift and tire slips as real driving!
Features:
4x4 amazing Truck, Monster Car and Crazy truck car.
Intriguing sports cars escape levels
Grand escape plan & modern cars stunts for real driver skills
Heart pounding soundtrack
High quality 3D graphics & immersive gameplay
